thread.section_title: Skipper (formerly Jetaport) Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Skipper (formerly Jetaport) | hiskipper.com | 3 of 59
thread.title: Morgan McDonald
thread.title_full: Skipper (formerly Jetaport) reviewed by Morgan McDonald

author: Morgan McDonald
title: Morgan McDonald
text: Skipper is an excellent option for those looking for a stress free, easy way to book a block of hotel rooms. It sure beats taking the time to call individual hotels around the area. There were several hotel options I got to choose from that showed the different prices and amenities. I was extremely happy with this service! Michael Padro was very efficient in his work and responded to my emails right away! Five stars!!
